K10D0108_H0111:322a-6: len gyi gzugs kyi bag chags la mngon par zhen
K10D0108_H0111:322a-7: pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-8: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mtshan nyid mthong bar 'dun pa'o //
K10D0108_H0111:322a-10: 'di ni rgyu rkyen bzhi po chu klung gi gnas dang /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-11: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rlabs 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:322a-13: mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0108_H0111:322a-14: du dbang po thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang
K10D0108_H0111:322a-15: / spu'i khung bu lhan cig skye ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-16: rim gyis yul gyi rjes su skye ba'ang de bzhin te /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-17: ji ltar me long rab tu gsal ba'i nang du gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no //
K10D0108_H0111:322a-20: rlung rab tu drag pos rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rab tu skyod par byed pa de bzhin du /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-21: phyi rol gyi yul gyi rlung gis kyang sems kyi
K10D0108_H0111:322a-22: rgya mtsho bsgul bas rnam par shes pa'i rlabs rnams
K10D0108_H0111:322a-24: rgyu dang bya ba'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-25: tha dad ma yin pa gcig tu 'dres pa /
K10D0108_H0111:322a-26: las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid la shin tu mngon par zhen pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:322b-0: @322b gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid
K10D0108_H0111:322b-1: mi rtogs pas de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs
K10D0108_H0111:322b-2: lnga 'jug go / blo gros chen po /
K10D0108_H0111:322b-3: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag dang
K10D0108_H0111:322b-4: lhan cig pa'i rgyu la bye brag gis rnam pa'i
K10D0108_H0111:322b-5: mtshan nyid khong du chud par byed pas yid kyi
K10D0108_H0111:322b-6: rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ni de'i lus kyi rjes
K10D0108_H0111:322b-7: su 'jug pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:322b-8: de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni phan tshun
K10D0108_H0111:322b-9: gcig gi rgyu gcig byed do snyam du mi sems
K10D0108_H0111:322b-10: te / 'on kyang rang gi sems snang ba la
K10D0108_H0111:322b-11: rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa 'jug cing
K10D0108_H0111:322b-12: de dag so so nas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang
K10D0108_H0111:322b-14: yul gyi rnam pa'i bye brag 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste //
K10D0108_H0111:322b-17: ji ltar rnal 'byor ba dag bsam gtan dang ting
K10D0108_H0111:322b-18: nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa bag chags shin
K10D0108_H0111:322b-19: tu phra rab 'jug pa rnams mi shes pa de
K10D0108_H0111:322b-21: bdag cag rnam par shes pa bkag nas snyoms par
K10D0108_H0111:322b-22: zhugs so snyam du sems kyang yang dag par rnam
K10D0108_H0111:322b-23: par shes pa bkag nas snyoms par zhugs pa ma
K10D0108_H0111:322b-24: yin te / 'di ltar bag chags kyi sa bon
K10D0108_H0111:322b-25: shin tu phra ba ma 'gags pa'i phyir ma 'gags
K10D0108_H0111:322b-26: yin te / pa'o // yul la 'jug cing 'dzin pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ni 'gag pa'o //
K10D0108_H0111:323a-0: de ltar shin tu phra ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes @323a *//
K10D0108_H0111:323a-1: pa de mthar thug par rtogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-2: sa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-4: mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-5: shes rab kyi stobs kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so //
K10D0108_H0111:323a-6: gzhan dun sa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-9: thabs la mkhas pa rnam par 'byed pa dag tshig
K10D0108_H0111:323a-10: gi don rab tu dbye ba la rnam par gdon
K10D0108_H0111:323a-11: mi za ba rgyal ba mtha' yas pa rnams las
K10D0108_H0111:323a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsags pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-13: rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i
K10D0108_H0111:323a-14: spros pa dang bral ba ri dang nags tshal stug
K10D0108_H0111:323a-15: po dang / shing khrod na gnas shing rnal 'byor tha ma dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-17: rab tu bsgoms pa rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rgyud mthong ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-18: zhing tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0108_H0111:323a-27: rang gi sems snang ba'i rang bzhin gyi spyod yul
K10D0108_H0111:323b-0: spros pa'i mtshan nyid @323b rig cing 'khor ba srid
K10D0108_H0111:323b-4: mi shes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las rgyal bar nus so //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-7: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyal ba rnams la bsten par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir /
K10D0108_H0111:323b-9: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-10: dper na rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-11: de dag rlung drag dbang gis byung //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-12: rlabs chen rgya mtsho rab bskyod pas //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-13: rgyun ni rnam par chad pa med /
K10D0108_H0111:323b-14: kun gzhi rgya mtsho rtag gnas pa //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-15: yul gyi rlung gis rab bskyod nas //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-16: sna tshogs rnam shes dba' rlabs rnams //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-18: sngon po dmar po sna tshogs gzugs //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-19: dung dang 'o ma kha ra dang //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-20: bska ba me tog 'bras bu dang //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-21: nyi zla dang ni 'od zer dang //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-22: gcig pa ma yin tha dad min //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-23: rgya mtsho rlabs rnams rab tu bskyed //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-24: de bzhin rnam shes bdun po yang //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-25: sems dang lhan cig rab tu skye; ;ji ltar rgya mtsho yongs gyur nas //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-26: dba' rlabs sna tshogs 'jug pa ltar //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-27: rnam shes bdun po de bzhin te //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-28: sems dang lhan cig rab tu skye //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-29: kun gzhi rnam shes gnas las ni //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-30: rnam shes sna tshogs rab 'jug ste //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-31: 'di ltar yid dang rnam shes des //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-32: mtshan nyid don la rab tu sems //
K10D0108_H0111:323b-33: mi 'jigs mtshan nyid brgyad yod de //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-2: rgya mtsho dang ni dba' rlabs rnams //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-3: ji ltar bye brag med pa bzhin //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-4: rnam shes sems dang de bzhin du //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-5: tha dad pa yang mi dmigs so //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-6: sems ni las gsog byed ces bya //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-7: yid kyi rgya cher gsog pa ste //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-8: rnam shes dag ni rnam par rigs //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-9: snang ba'i yul ltos sngar bshad do //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324a-11: sngon po dmar po'i gzugs rnams ni //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-12: sems can rnam shes skyed par bgyid //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-13: rlabs dang mtshungs pa'i sna tshogs chos //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-14: ci slad bdag la bshad du gsol //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324a-16: sngon po dmar po sna tshogs gzugs //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-17: dba' rlabs dag ni yod ma yin //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-18: las gsog sems su bshad pa yang //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-19: skye bo rtogs par bya phyir ro //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-20: las de yang ni yod ma yin //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-21: rang gi sems ni gzung dang bral //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-22: gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa'ang med //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-23: dba' rlabs de dang rab tu mtshungs //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-24: longs spyod lus dag rnam gzhag pa //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-25: sems can snang ba'i rnam shes yin //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-26: de las las rnams snang bar byed //
K10D0108_H0111:324a-27: dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang mtshungs //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos @324b yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-1: rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dngos po ni //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-2: gar bgyid g-yo bas rig 'gyur la //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-3: kun gzhi las kyang de ltar na //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-4: ci yi slad du blos mi rig /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-6: byis pa blo dang mi ldan pas //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-7: kun gzhi rgya mtsho 'dra ba dang //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-8: las kyi mtshan nyid rlabs lta bu'i //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-9: dpe la brten nas rtogs par 'gyur //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-11: skye bo bzang ngan par ma la //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-12: gdugs ni mnyam par shar ba bzhin //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-13: bde gshegs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa'ang //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-14: byis pa rnams la yang dag chos //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-15: rab tu rnam 'byed gsung rigs na //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-16: ci slad yang dag gsung mi mdzad //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-18: ci ste yang dag bshad du ni //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-19: de yi sems la yang dag med //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-20: ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dang //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-21: me long gzugs brnyan rmi lam dag /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-22: de dag thams cad cig car snang //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-23: sems kyi spyod yul de bzhin no //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-24: yul rnams dang ni mi ldan phyir //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-25: rim gyis las dag 'jug cing skye //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-26: rnam par shes pas rnam par rig /
K10D0108_H0111:324b-27: yid ni de bzhin sems par byed //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-28: lnga po dag ni snang bar 'gyur //
K10D0108_H0111:324b-29: de la go rims nges pa med //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-1: ltar ri mo'i mkhan po dang //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-2: ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma dag /
K10D0108_H0111:325a-3: ri mo'i don du tshon 'gyed ltar //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-4: nga yi bshad pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-5: tshon la ri mo yod ma yin //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-6: smyig gu dang ni gzhi la med //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-7: sems can dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-8: tshon gyis ri mo mngon par bsgrubs //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-9: bshad pa dag ni gzhan phyir spyod //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-10: yang dag nyid ni yi ge spangs //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-11: rnam 'byed las ni dang po ba //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-12: rnal 'byor pa la yang dag bstan //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-13: so so rang rig yang dag ni //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-14: rtog dang rtag par rab tu spangs //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-15: rgyal ba'i sras la 'di bstan gyi //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-16: byis pa la ni gzhan rab 'byed //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-17: ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag /
K10D0108_H0111:325a-18: snang yang yang dag ma yin te //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-19: de bzhin bshad pa sna tshogs kyang //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-20: bya ba'i rjes su gzhag pa yin //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-21: bshad pa mthun par ma gyur pa //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-22: de la bshad pa ma yin 'gyur //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-23: ji ltar nad pa so so la //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-24: sman mkhas dpyad rnams bstan pa ltar //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-25: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-26: mos pa ji bzhin rab tu ston //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-27: brtse bas rab tu gsungs pa yi //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-28: so so rang gi spyod yul ni //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-29: rtog ge pa yi yul ma yin //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-30: nyan thos rnams kyang skal yod min //
K10D0108_H0111:325a-33: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis rang gi sems snang ba'i gzung ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-0: 'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa'i spyod @325b yul yongs su shes par 'dod pas 'du ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-2: gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:325b-5: nam gyi gung thun la bdag nyid rtag tu dran
K10D0108_H0111:325b-6: pa dang ldan zhing mi nyal bar sbyor ba la
K10D0108_H0111:325b-8: lta ba ngan pa rnams kyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:325b-12: rang gi sems snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par rtogs par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:325b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ye shes dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-16: shes rab kyi mtshan nyid dgod pa la gnas nas /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-17: gong du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum la rab tu brtson pas bsgrub par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:325b-18: gong du brtson zhing bsgrub par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum po de'ang gang zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-20: snang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi smon lam gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-22: 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes mthar thug pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-23: rnal 'byor pas de dag khong du chud pas bong du theng po lta bu'i sems dang /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-25: ye shes kyi mtshan nyid spangs te /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-26: rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa brgyad pa thob nas /
K10D0108_H0111:325b-27: de'i gong du mtshan nyid gsum la rab tu brtson par byed do //
K10D0108_H0111:326a-2: snang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0108_H0111:326a-5: mu stegs can gyi mtshan nyid de dag yongs su 'dris pa las skye'o //
K10D0108_H0111:326a-7: rang gi smon lam gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0108_H0111:326a-8: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang gi smon lam
K10D0108_H0111:326a-9: gyi gnas la mngon par brtson pa las 'byung ngo
K10D0108_H0111:326a-11: 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes
K10D0108_H0111:326a-12: mthar thug pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad kyi
K10D0108_H0111:326a-13: mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang
K10D0108_H0111:326a-14: / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lus rab tu thob pas /
K10D0108_H0111:326a-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa'i gnas la brtson zhing 'jug pa'i spyod pa las skye ste /
K10D0108_H0111:326a-17: 'di ni 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum zhes bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:326a-18: gal te 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mtshan nyid 'di
K10D0108_H0111:326a-19: gsum dang ldan na rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i
K10D0108_H0111:326a-20: ye shes mthar thug pa'i spyod yul khong du chud
K10D0108_H0111:326a-21: par 'gyur ro // de lta bas na /
K10D0108_H0111:326a-23: 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum po dag la rab tu brtson par bya'o ////
K10D0108_H0111:326a-24: 'phags pa langkar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-0: de nas byang chub sems @326b dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0108_H0111:326b-1: po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
K10D0108_H0111:326b-2: de dag gi sems kyi bsam pa rab tu shes
K10D0108_H0111:326b-3: pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po dang /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-4: rang bzhin rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos
K10D0108_H0111:326b-5: kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin
K10D0108_H0111:326b-6: gyi rlabs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
K10D0108_H0111:326b-8: 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po dang /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-9: rang bzhin rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bdag la bshad du gsol /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-10: tshig brgya rtsa brgyad shin tu rnam par 'byed pa'i
K10D0108_H0111:326b-11: gnas gang 'di la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0108_H0111:326b-12: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0108_H0111:326b-13: rnams kyis rab tu phye ste /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-14: bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0108_H0111:326b-15: rnams rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i rnam
K10D0108_H0111:326b-16: par rtog pa'i rang bzhin la rab tu 'jug ste
K10D0108_H0111:326b-17: / rab tu phye ba'i tshul gyis rnam par rtog
K10D0108_H0111:326b-18: pa'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir so sor rab tu
K10D0108_H0111:326b-19: rtog pa la mkhas shing gang zag dang chos la
K10D0108_H0111:326b-20: bdag med par rtogs pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-21: rnam par rtog pa rab tu sel zhing sa rnams la shin tu gsal ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-24: mu stegs can thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang /
K10D0108_H0111:326b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba las shin tu 'da' ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:327a-1: pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul la so sor rab tu rtog pa dang /

K10D0108_H0111:364b-2: gsungs so // byin rlabs ldan pa mi yi gtso //

K10D0108_H0111:365b-15: blo gros chen po; de dag ni dngos po'ang ma yin /

K10D0108_H0111:366b-0: po blo gros chen pos bcom @366b ldan 'das la

K10D0108_H0111:366b-28: ba dang mi mthong ba'i phyir nor pa ni dngos

K10D0108_H0111:374b-18: skye ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu mthong bas na de'i phyir mi snyems so //
K10D0108_H0111:374b-21: byis pa so so'i skye bo dag mi 'gyur bar
K10D0108_H0111:374b-22: dka' thub len cing sbyor ba dag gis longs spyod
K10D0108_H0111:374b-23: dang / bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir skye ba gnyer bar byed do //
K10D0108_H0111:374b-24: de de ltar mi snyems pa'ang gzhan du na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
K10D0108_H0111:374b-25: so so rang gis rig pa'i khyad par rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:374b-26: rtog pa dang bral ba zag pa med pa'i chos
K10D0108_H0111:374b-27: kyi mtshan nyid la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir tshul
K10D0108_H0111:374b-28: khrims kyi yan lag yang dag par len cing srung
K10D0108_H0111:375a-1: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-2: brtul zhugs spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:375a-3: rgyun du zhugs pas kun tu sbyor pa gsum spangs pa la ni 'dod chags dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-5: gal te rgyun du zhugs pa 'di snyam du kun
K10D0108_H0111:375a-6: tu sbyor ba 'di rnams ni bdag la mngon par
K10D0108_H0111:375a-7: ma grub bo snyam du sems pa ni nyes pa
K10D0108_H0111:375a-9: 'jig tshogs la lta bar song ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-10: kun tu sbyor ba rnams ma spangs pa'o //
K10D0108_H0111:375a-11: blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pa mang du gsungs na /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-13: des 'dod chags gang zhig spangs pa lags /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-16: bud med la sred cing 'dod pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-17: mngon par chags shing zhen pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs las byung ba /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-18: lus dang ngag gi las kha na mtho ba dang
K10D0108_H0111:375a-19: bcas pa des da ltar gyi bde ba la sred
K10D0108_H0111:375a-20: cing ma 'ongs pa na sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur
K10D0108_H0111:375a-21: ba de dag de la mi 'byung ngo //
K10D0108_H0111:375a-23: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la gnas pa thob pas de'i phyir de spangs pa yin te /
K10D0108_H0111:375a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa rtogs par bya ba'i 'dod chags spangs pa ni ma yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:375b-0: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid gang @375b zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-2: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid cig snang zhing rnam par rtog
K10D0108_H0111:375b-3: pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid du mthong ba'i mtshan nyid
K10D0108_H0111:375b-5: bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rab tu mthong ba'i phyir
K10D0108_H0111:375b-6: 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs nas cig car sdug bsngal mthar
K10D0108_H0111:375b-7: byas te mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par byed
K10D0108_H0111:375b-8: pas de'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o
K10D0108_H0111:375b-9: // blo gros chen po; ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba yin zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-13: da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po rnams dngos po med pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-14: lta ba'i nyes pa skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba'i phyir dang /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-15: kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:375b-17: dgra bcom pa ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-24: sdug bsngal rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med pas de'i phyir dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:375b-25: blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bcom pa rnam pa gsum du bka' stsal na /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-27: 'dir dgra bcom pa gang dag la bgyi bar bka' stsal /
K10D0108_H0111:375b-29: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa theg pa gcig gis lam rab tu thob pa'am /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-1: sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis de ltar ston pa'i dgra bcom pa'am /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-2: de ste sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pas sprul pa zhig lags /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-5: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa theg pa gcig gi lam du thob pa'i nyan thos yin gyi /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-6: gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:376a-7: gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-8: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pas sprul pa rnams te /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-10: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skye ba ston te /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-11: sangs rgyas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mdzes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K10D0108_H0111:376a-13: rnam par rtog pa 'jug pa'i gnas su rnam pa
K10D0108_H0111:376a-14: sna tshogs kyi chos bstan pa ni 'di lta ste
K10D0108_H0111:376a-17: de la bsam gtan ni bsam gtan la zhugs pa na /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-18: rab tu dben pa'i phyir dang /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-19: rang gi sems snang bar ston pas 'bras bu 'thob
K10D0108_H0111:376a-20: pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu thob pa zhes bya'o
K10D0108_H0111:376a-25: gzugs med pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod na /
K10D0108_H0111:376a-26: rang gi sems snang ba'i mtshan nyid las ldog par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-0: 'du @376b shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par
K10D0108_H0111:376b-1: 'jug pa ni rang gi sems snang ba las 'das
K10D0108_H0111:376b-4: sems snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang
K10D0108_H0111:376b-6: bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
K10D0108_H0111:376b-7: so // bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med bzhi //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-8: gzugs med pa yi ting 'dzin dang //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-10: sems tsam la ni de yod min //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-11: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-13: dgra bcom pa yi 'bras bu rnams //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-14: de dag thams cad sems 'khrul ba //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-15: bsam gtan dang ni bsam gtan rkyen //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-16: spong shes bden pa yang dag mthong //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-17: de dag rtog pa tsam yin par //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-18: gang gis rtogs pa de 'grol lo //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-21: blo rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K10D0108_H0111:376b-23: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i blo dang /
K10D0108_H0111:376b-24: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas rnam par bzhag pa'i blo'o //
K10D0108_H0111:376b-27: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i blo ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0108_H0111:376b-28: blo gang gis dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid
K10D0108_H0111:376b-29: rab tu gzhigs na mtha' bzhi dang bral bas mi
K10D0108_H0111:376b-30: dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i
K10D0108_H0111:377a-6: gnyis ka ma yin pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-7: yod pa dang; med pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-9: med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-11: mi rtag pa ni mtha' bzhi zhes bshad de /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-13: mtha' bzhi po de dag dang bral ba ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:377a-15: mtha' bzhi po 'dis chos thams cad yongs su brtags pa la rab tu bslab par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:377a-16: de la; blo gros chen po /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-17: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon
K10D0108_H0111:377a-18: par zhen pas rnam par bzhag pa'i blo gang zhe
K10D0108_H0111:377a-20: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa gang gis sra ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377a-23: g-yo ba yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:377a-24: rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba chen po rnams su
K10D0108_H0111:377a-27: dpe la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa ma
K10D0108_H0111:377a-28: yin pa rnam par bzhag pas rnam par bzhag pa
K10D0108_H0111:377a-29: ste / de ni rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid
K10D0108_H0111:377a-30: 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas rnam par bzhag
K10D0108_H0111:377a-32: de ni blo rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do //
K10D0108_H0111:377b-0: byang chub sems @377b dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
K10D0108_H0111:377b-1: blo 'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan na gang
K10D0108_H0111:377b-2: zag dang chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par
K10D0108_H0111:377b-3: khong du chud cing snang ba med pa'i blo la
K10D0108_H0111:377b-4: mkhas pa dang / spyod pa'i sa la so sor
K10D0108_H0111:377b-5: rab tu rtog pas sa dang po rab tu 'thob
K10D0108_H0111:377b-6: mkhas pa dang / ste / ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par 'jug /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-7: bye brag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu 'thob /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-9: byang chub sems dpa' brgya'ang mthong /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-10: bskal pa brgyar sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-11: phyi ma'i mtha'i dngos po la 'jug /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-12: 'od kyis zhing brgya'ang snang bar byed do //
K10D0108_H0111:377b-13: gong nas gong du sa'i mtshan nyid shes te /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-14: smon lam chen po khyad par can gyis rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:377b-15: 'phrul pa la dbang zhing chos kyi sprin gyi dbang
K10D0108_H0111:377b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis thugs su
K10D0108_H0111:377b-18: chud pa'i sa thob nas mthar thug pa'i gnas bcu
K10D0108_H0111:377b-19: dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos su 'gyur te /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-20: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sprul
K10D0108_H0111:377b-21: pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes shing
K10D0108_H0111:377b-22: so so rang gis rig pa'i bde bas mnyam par
K10D0108_H0111:377b-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'byung ba chen po dang /
K10D0108_H0111:377b-27: 'byung ba las gyur pa la mkhas par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:377b-28: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba chen po dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-1: las gyur pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-3: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yang dag par rab tu rtog ste /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-4: de don dam pa'i bden par ni 'byung ba chen po dag skye ba med do //
K10D0108_H0111:378a-5: 'byung ba chen po dag la skye ba med par de ltar rab tu rtog par byed de /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-6: de ltar rab tu brtags nas ming dang rgyu mtshan rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-7: rang gi sems snang ba tsam dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-8: phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams dngos po med par
K10D0108_H0111:378a-9: rtogs pa ni rang gi sems snang ba rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:378a-10: rtog pa tsam zhes bya'o; ;'di lta ste /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-12: 'byung ba las gyur pa de dag la rab tu brtags na /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-13: ngo bo nyid kyis mtha' bzhi dang bral bas tshul
K10D0108_H0111:378a-14: rnam par dag pa bdag dang bdag gi bral ba
K10D0108_H0111:378a-15: / yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs su gnas pa /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-16: ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du 'grub par mthong ngo //
K10D0108_H0111:378a-18: ji ltar na 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de
K10D0108_H0111:378a-19: dag gis rgyur byas pa'i gzugs rnams skyed ce na
K10D0108_H0111:378a-21: gsher bar rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi chu'i khams skyed do /
K10D0108_H0111:378a-22: bya ba nus pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba
K10D0108_H0111:378a-23: chen pos ni phyi nang gi me'i khams skyed do
K10D0108_H0111:378a-24: // g-yo bar rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen
K10D0108_H0111:378b-0: pos ni @378b phyi nang gi rlung gi khams skyed
K10D0108_H0111:378b-1: // do // gzugs gcad du rung bar rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:378b-2: rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi
K10D0108_H0111:378b-3: // do // sa'i khams skyed do;/ gzugs dang nam
K10D0108_H0111:378b-4: mkha' gnyis ka'ang log pa'i bden pa la mngon par
K10D0108_H0111:378b-5: zhen pas phung po lnga 'dus pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-9: rnam par shes pa ni gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-10: yul la mngon par chags pa'i rgyus 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0108_H0111:378b-12: sa la sogs pa chen po bzhi dang /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-13: 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams la ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rten yod kyi /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-14: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag gi rkyen ni ma yin no /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-21: sbyor ba rnams dngos po med pas 'byung ba chen po rnams mi skye'o //
K10D0108_H0111:378b-28: sbyor ba rnams 'dus pa las skye bas /
K10D0108_H0111:378b-29: dbyibs med pa ma yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:378b-33: 'byung ba las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni mu stegs can rnams kyis rnam par brtags pa yin gyi /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-1: gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:379a-2: phung po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-5: phung po lnga gang zhe na /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-11: rnam par shes pa rnams so //
K10D0108_H0111:379a-12: de la phung po bzhi rnams ni gzugs med de; tshor ba dang /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-15: rnam par shes pa rnams so //
K10D0108_H0111:379a-17: gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-18: 'byung ba las gyur pa phan tshun du mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K10D0108_H0111:379a-20: gzugs med pa la bzhir bgrang du med de /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-23: nam mkha' ni grangs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das te /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-24: bgrang ba dang bral mod kyi /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-25: rnam par rtog pas nam mkha' zhes brjod do //
K10D0108_H0111:379a-27: de bzhin du phung po rnams kyang grangs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das te /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-28: bgrang ba dang bral bas dngos po dang /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-29: dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-32: bgrang ba'i mtshan nyid ni byis pas rab tu brjod pa yin gyi /
K10D0108_H0111:379a-33: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-0: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni sgyu ma lta bur gzugs rnam pa sna @379b tshogs gcig pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:379b-1: tha dad pa rnam par spangs par nye bar 'dogs so //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-3: gzugs brnyan gyi skyes bu ltar gcig pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:379b-4: tha dad pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-6: 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi tshul ni phung po dang 'dra bar rtog pas snang ngo //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-7: de ni phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid de /
K10D0108_H0111:379b-9: rnam par bzlog nas rab tu dben pa'i chos bstan
K10D0108_H0111:379b-10: pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mu stegs
K10D0108_H0111:379b-11: can gyi lta ba rnams bzlog par bya'o //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-12: blo gros chen po; rab tu dben pa'i chos bstan
K10D0108_H0111:379b-13: pa'i tshe chos bdag med pa mthong ba rnam par
K10D0108_H0111:379b-14: dag par 'gyur / mi g-yo ba'i sa la'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-15: de mi g-yo ba'i sar rab tu zhugs nas /
K10D0108_H0111:379b-16: ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-17: yid kyi lus thob pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-20: dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud pas sems can thams cad sdud cing phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0108_H0111:379b-22: sa chen po ni sems can rnams 'degs shing phan
K10D0108_H0111:379b-23: 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
K10D0108_H0111:379b-24: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can thams cad la
K10D0108_H0111:380a-2: mu stegs can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa bzhi yod de /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-5: dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-6: mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi dngos po dngos po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-7: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par rtogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-8: phung po rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi
K10D0108_H0111:380a-9: rgyud kyi rgyun chad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o
K10D0108_H0111:380a-10: // de dag ni mu stegs can rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-11: nga'i gsung rab la ma yin no //
K10D0108_H0111:380a-13: nga'i gsung rab la ni rnam par rtog pa dang
K10D0108_H0111:380a-14: bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa bzlog pa ni mya
K10D0108_H0111:380a-16: blo gros chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa brgyad du rnam par ma bzhag pa lags sam /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-20: blo gros chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-22: gal te rnam par bzhag na ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa log pas gsal /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-23: rnam par shes pa bdun rnams ni ma lags /
K10D0108_H0111:380a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis blo gros chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0108_H0111:380b-0: de dag gi rgyu @380b dang; de dag gis dmigs
